code: import React from'react';import people from'./people';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AverageAgeByOccupation(){const occupationGroups=people.reduce((acc,person)=>{if(!acc[person.occupation]){acc[person.occupation]=[];}acc[person.occupation].push(person.age);return acc;},{});const averageAges=Object.keys(occupationGroups).map(occupation=>{const ages=occupationGroups[occupation];const averageAge=ages.reduce((sum,age)=>sum+age,0)/ages.length;return{occupation,averageAge};});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Exercise 10: Calculate the Average Age of Each Occupation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Average Age by Occupation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:averageAges.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.occupation,": ",item.averageAge.toFixed(2)," years"]},index))})]});}export default AverageAgeByOccupation;
